page.title: 05INDUSTRY cont'd
page.content: {McGAWN Bros.}are haulage contractors employing 12. Some customers are Kelco Barr Construction and Rowntree MacKin- tosh.In Maybole for 15yrs they hope to expand. {McQUATER Bros.}sell animal foodstuffs and fertilisers to the farming commun- ity. They employ 29 and were founded in Maybole over 85yrs ago. {INTERPAK}make fabric covered presenta- tion cases and boxes. They employ 125- 200 selling to the jewellery and gift industries, and major wholesalers.In Maybole for 19 yrs. {FAULDS}are building contractors for the local authority,gov't contracts & private sector.Est.1891 they employ 60 {WEST COAST PRINTERS}employ 5. Produce signs for industrial and shop traders. In Maybole 3yrs expansion planned.
